sentences.en: He is so naive as to believe such a lie.
sentences.cn: 他竟然幼稚得连这种谎言都相信.

sentences.en: He was touchingly naive about sex.
Her colourful oils and works on paper have a naive, dreamlike quality.
sentences.cn: 她那些色彩斑斓的油画与纸上作品给人一种天真、梦幻般的感觉。

sentences.en: Her paintings have a naive, dreamlike quality.
sentences.cn: 她的画作带有质朴、空灵的韵味。

sentences.en: Hsin - mei felt the question was naive beyond a doubt.
sentences.cn: 辛楣 觉得这问题无可猜的幼稚.

sentences.en: I know I was a naive fool to trust him but he is a real charmer who totally took me in.
sentences.cn: 我知道我当初幼稚无知，竟然信任他，可是他真是迷人，把我完全给骗了。

sentences.en: I must have been naive to think we would get my parents' blessing.
sentences.cn: 我一定太天真了，竟认为我们会得到我父母的祝福。

sentences.en: It's naive of you to believe he'll do what he says.
sentences.cn: 相信他会言行一致,你未免太单纯了.

sentences.en: Jim can be so naive sometimes.
Modern readers would find such naive solution totally unacceptable.
sentences.cn: 现代读者会觉得这种天真的结局完全无法接受.

sentences.en: She is so naive that she believes everything he tells her.
sentences.cn: 她如此天真以致相信他告诉她的一切.

sentences.en: She's so naive that she believes everything he tells her.
sentences.cn: 她涉世不深以致相信他所告诉她的每一件事.

sentences.en: The display of prehistoric monsters is comically naive.
sentences.cn: 史前怪物的展览幼稚可笑。

sentences.en: The drama takes an idealistic, even a naive view of the subject.
sentences.cn: 这部戏在对待这一主题上有些理想化，甚至是天真。

sentences.en: Their view was that he had been politically naive.
sentences.cn: 他们认为他在政治上一直很幼稚。

words.tran_cn: 简单,单纯,天真;纯洁,不世故,轻信

trans.tran_en: not having much experience of how complicated life is, so that you trust people too much and believe that good things will always happen
